title: Riot please fix Lux's Q animation
body: It is so hard to verse Lux when her old particle match is an appalling representation of the hitbox. It is atleast twice as wide. Morgana's Q fits hers, please make Lux's look like the hitbox. It's really hard and annoying to play against when you try to dodge it and dodge the particle completely but you still get stunned or whatever.
